keywords: ['accordion', 'bass guitar', 'timid boy voice', 'drums', 'electric guitar', 'country music vibes']
caption: The music features a timid boy voice singing a melody. Right in the opening of the music excerpt, before the boy starts to sing, an accordion can be heard playing a short melody. A band that consists of drums, bass guitar and electric guitar is accompanying the boy. Listening to the electric guitar, I get country music vibes.
